abstract: Seattle Seahawks officially place running back Marshawn Lynch on reserve/retired list; other NFL news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Seattle Seahawks placed running back Marshawn Lynch on the N.F.L.’s reserve/retired list Thursday, confirming what had been implied in February.

headline.main: Marshawn Lynch’s Retirement Confirmed; Johnny Manziel Appears in Court
headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Football; Lynch’s Retirement Confirmed

snippet: The Seattle Seahawks placed running back Marshawn Lynch on the N.F.L.’s reserve/retired list Thursday, confirming what had been implied in February.
